title: The 2011 Oscars Were a Travesty. Let’s Fix That.
description:
With key victories at the DGAs and BAFTAs in the books, Sean and Amanda discuss whether it’s all over but the shouting for 'Nomadland’ and the Best Picture prize at the Academy Awards (0:30). Then, they travel back in time 10 years to redo one of the most egregious movie award ceremonies in recent memory: the 2011 Oscars (30:46).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
